metadata.name: 01: A Strand Of Hair
metadata.description:
A Strand Of Hair is the first piece in the book: Lonely Is The Name.

Lonely Is The Name is a collection of eighteen stories that depict Lonely's journey as he ventures solitarily through the boreal mountains in pursuit of finding a richer sense of meaning with Being.

In this opening chapter, Lonely sets out on the grandest odyssey of his dull and monotonous life and catches his first glimpse of the awe-inspiring mountains of Lapland. As he takes his first steps into the unknown, he faces the first hardships of his self-induced isolation.
